meanings.sent1: The movie had the hokiest dialogue I've ever heard.
meanings.sent2: That joke is the hokiest one in the entire show.
meanings.sent3: The hokiest part was when the character slipped on a banana peel for the tenth time.
meanings.sent4: Her fashion sense was the hokiest, like a blast from the past.
meanings.sent5: The hokiest song on the radio gets stuck in my head for days.

meanings.definition: the most exaggerated or contrived aspect
meanings.sent1: In the play, the hokiest was the dramatic death scene.
meanings.sent2: The hokiest of the story was the unbelievable plot twist.
meanings.sent3: The party's hokiest was the magician who pulled a rabbit out of a hat.
meanings.sent4: The hokiest of the painting was the unrealistic sunset in the background.
meanings.sent5: The hokiest of the movie was the over-the-top car chase scene.

meanings.definition: to present in a contrived or overly sentimental way
meanings.sent1: She hokiest the romantic proposal by hiring a skywriter.
meanings.sent2: The director hokiest the emotional scene with slow-motion effects.
meanings.sent3: He hokiest the surprise party by inviting all her favorite celebrities.
meanings.sent4: The author hokiest the ending by having the long-lost siblings reunite.
meanings.sent5: The singer hokiest the ballad by adding unnecessary vocal runs.
